content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: AESMIE
      operator: equal_to
      value: Y
    - name: QNAM
      operator: equal_to
      value: AESOSP
    - name: QVAL
      operator: non_empty
Match Datasets:
  - Name: SUPPAE
    Keys:
      - USUBJID
    Is Relationship: true
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0043
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: When AESMIE=Y then SUPPAE.QNAM=AESOSP should be present
Outcome:
  Message: Missing SUPPAE.QNAM=AESOSP, where AESMIE=Y
  Output Variables:
    - AESOSP
    - AESMIE
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Variable
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0043
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: When a description of Other Medically Important Serious
                  Adverse Events category is collected on a CRF, sponsors should place
                  the description in the SUPPAE dataset using the standard supplemental
                  qualifier name code AESOSP.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Asumtpion 6c
                Section: 6.2.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - EVENTS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - AE

json.Description: When AESMIE=Y then SUPPAE.QNAM=AESOSP should be present

Citations.Cited_Guidance: When a description of Other Medically Important Serious Adverse Events category is collected on a CRF, sponsors should place the description in the SUPPAE dataset using the standard supplemental qualifier name code AESOSP.
